Description: Loaded with pockets for organization, this rolling laptop tote offers versatile carrying options for the professional woman on the go. The McKlein USA Melrose Vertical Rolling Leather Laptop Tote EXCLUSIVE is made from rich leather and features a vertical design with a comfortable shoulder strap, dual top handles, and a patented, detachable 2-in-1 wheel and handle system. This tote bag has a roomy main compartment that includes a padded laptop section, a padded zipper pocket to hold your tablet or eReader, a storage area for files, and an organize panel to hold all of your small personal items. A flap front pocket with a twist lock closure offers added storage for files, documents, or other accessories. Laptop Compartment Dimensions: 14.5" x 11" x 2.5" Size: Small Exterior Dimensions: 16.5" x 14.5" x 5" Linear Inches: 36" Strap Drop Length: 4" Weight: 8 lbs, 6 oz Material: Leather Warranty: Limited Lifetime Luggagedesigners wants you to love your purchase. If we do ship internationally, please be aware that customs may hold your product up to 60 days if they wish. Most do not but it is not unheard of for three to four weeks delivery. There is nothing we can do but provide you with a customs number and tracking information once it leaves our warehouse. For international deliveries please do not ask us to provide false information to customs. We adhere to all international shipping laws. Please check the Ebay policy for buyer’s responsibility for duty fees. Please do not give us poor shipping feedback if customs holds your package. Thank you
